title: Could This $70 PC Case Dominate in 2019?
description: The be quiet! Pure Base 500 is their least expensive case yet at just $70 but it packs a ton of features and features great build quality.  We had some time with early tooling samples at Computex 2019 and it looks like the Pure Base 500 could really provide some great competition in its price point.    Subscribe    Thanks to Phanteks and Steelseries for sponsoring our Computex content.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #purebase500 #computex 2019 #hardwarecanucks #bequiet

that you can move slightly inwards to clear up some space for the front where you can install a 360 rad and also you can install dual hard drives in there or a single SSD and finally for the top you can mount up to a 240 rad but given how close the mounting locations are to the rear exhaust fan I feel like doing any radiator up here would be challenging so perhaps sticking to airflow only for the top would be my choice and given how Y the enclosure is it is definitely targeted towards mounting a nice large CPU cooler so that would be my round now the cool thing about the Pure Base 500 is that it's still in the development stages so the tooling is not finalized which means any feedback you can provide in the comments about it will potentially make its way into the final release so one thing
